data.message: I wish a could send u a message man, but this was the best i could find on ur page. guess it's worth a shot. i just wanna say ur new cd is amazing. thank you. i've been listening to you now for 15 years. you are amazing. i love ur headlights song. i've come to know it well in the last few hours. ur music is so real man. i feel ur emotions in ur songs, and that's whats amazing to me. we are a like in many ways. except ur famous and im not. although i should be! i love to sing, and im good at it. hopefully someday i get discovered. i will be able to meet you and shake ur hand. thank you again for being a inspiration in my life Eminem!! hope u keep em coming for years. u truly are a RAP GOD!!!
